Address.Address1: Kucuk Ayasofya Cad. Kapiagasi Sokak No:7

Description.Text: If you are looking for an alternative to traditional hotel accommodation, then the hotel would like to welcome you to annex the new Tashkonak studio suites Istanbul Hotel, the newest suite hotel in Istanbul's Sultanahmet area. The Tashkonak Suites Istanbul Hotel not only offers you great value for money, flexibility, independence and privacy but is conveniently located in the heart of Istanbul's famous historical district of Sultanate. Just a short walk from this suites hotel, you will find most of Istanbul's major tourist attractions, such as the Blue Mosque, St. Sophia, the old Hippodrome, the Grand Bazaar, Topkapi Palace and the Basilica Cistern. Sultanahmet is also full of traditional and modern cafes and restaurants, all within easy walking distance from the Tashkonak Suites Hotel. This charming old 19th century Istanbul Ottoman house has been tastefully restored into comfortable suite rooms with modern facilities and spacious modern bathrooms. Each of the suites has been carefully designed and decorated to capture the atmosphere of the old Ottoman houses, featuring queen sized bed, kitchenette and sitting area in an open plan design. The furniture is handmade and in the traditional Turkish style for your comfort and pleasure. The kitchenette, long term guests will especially enjoy as it allows them to be a little more independent. For those with business needs there is also free WiFi Internet access and a study desk. The Tashkonak Suites Istanbul Hotel is the perfect place to relax after a busy day. From the Tashkonak Suites Istanbul Hotel's terrace, you can look over the roof tops of the old Sultanahmet neighborhood and enjoy a spectacular view of the Marmara Sea and the Blue Mosque. All suites are non-smoking and equipped with smoke detectors.
Hotel situated in the hearth of old city Sultanahmet. Hotel walking distance to Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Aya Sophia, Obelisks, underground cistern, Grand Bazaar ...

Studio Double Room - Studio Double Room offers one king bed with with air conditioning , alarm clock, cable / satellite TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, kitchenette, laundry service, microwave oven, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.
Studio Suites Room - Studio Suites offers one king bed and one single bed with air conditioning , alarm clock, cable / satellite TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, kitchenette, laundry service, microwave oven, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.
Ground Floor Double Room - Double Room On Ground Floor offers one queen bed with air conditioning , alarm clock, cable / satellite TV, ensuite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.
